short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cold Outreach Automation for Instagram (with AI)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate cold outreach at scale without sacrificing reply rate.
The tool can:
- Scrape leads (followers or likers of an account)
- Filter them (by keywords, followers, posts and links)
- Send AI personalised DMs based on their profile
